Text: RE Griffith flows Cc Kim Thank you for your attention to this matter Citizens is encouraged to see that steps are being taken and will continue to monitor the situation Kindly inform me personally at the earliest possible time should cuts of any nature occur in the future on this contract Thanks Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Sean Breen Email John Cogan Email Cc Tycholiz Barry Grigsby Mike Gay Randall L Sullivan Patti Groenewold Shannon Tholt Jane M Foster Chris H Subject Griffith flows Sean Attached is our response to your request for a description of the steps Enron is taking to improve flows to the Griffith power plant Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Kim cuts responsedoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Billing Errors Cc Please review the attached letter and supporting spreadsheets concerning the correction of billing errors between Citizens and Enron relative to our Colorada Gas Division A hardcopy of these documents is following via US mail Please call me at if you have any questions on this matter CitizensLGSReconciliationLetterdoc CitizensLGSReconciliationCUCxls

Griffith SalesAs I have discussed with you Citizens is concerned about the frequency of upstream supply issues that have resulted in the recent cuts in the deliveries to the Griffith power plant Based on the information I have received the reasons for these cuts have not risen to the level of Force Majeure which as you know is the only event that would excuse performance under our contract for firm delivery of gas Citizens therefore requests that Enron respond to Citizens in writing with a descriptions of the steps Enron is taking to insure that there is not a continuation of these contract performance issues into the future Your prompt attention to this matter is appreciated

RE Visit to Kingman AZ Cc The week of October is open for me Original Message From Hawkins Don mailto Sent Friday September AM To Smith Sarabeth Cc Watson Kimberly Scott Donna Roensch David Jolly Rich Subject RE Visit to Kingman AZ Sarabeth October and I will be in the Directors conference Can we reschedule for the week of October Don Original Message From Smith Sarabeth Sent Friday September AM To Cc Hawkins Don Watson Kimberly Scott Donna Roensch David Jolly Rich Subject Visit to Kingman AZ Sean Due to security issues and scheduling conflicts we suggest that the hoped for meeting between Citizens EAMR and Griffith Plant personnel in Kingman AZ be held during either the first or second weeks of October Do you have a preference on dates Possibly October th or th Sincerely Sarabeth Smith This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
